${ModID}:Backswing.NAME: Backswing
${ModID}:Backswing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

${ModID}:Bunker.NAME: Bunker
${ModID}:Bunker.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Upgrade adjacent cards.

${ModID}:Dominate.NAME: Dominate
${ModID}:Dominate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain [E] for each enemy with Vulnerable.

${ModID}:DragonPunch.NAME: Dragon Punch
${ModID}:DragonPunch.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FromBeyond.NAME: From Beyond
${ModID}:FromBeyond.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Sheathe a card in your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GravityHammer.NAME: Gravity Hammer
${ModID}:GravityHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal equal damage to adjacent enemies.

${ModID}:Iaido.NAME: Iaido
${ModID}:Iaido.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Sheathe all Attacks in your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:KneeSmash.NAME: Knee Smash
${ModID}:KneeSmash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals double damage to enemies with Vulnerable.

${ModID}:PlanAhead.NAME: Plan Ahead
${ModID}:PlanAhead.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Rearrange your hand.

${ModID}:PowerShot.NAME: Power Shot
${ModID}:PowerShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 0 if adjacent to a Power.

${ModID}:PreemptiveStrike.NAME: Preemptive Strike
${ModID}:PreemptiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If an adjacent card is an Attack, gain {@@}{!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|3=[E] [E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}.

${ModID}:RollingPunch.NAME: Rolling Punch
${ModID}:RollingPunch.DESCRIPTION: stslib:Persist !stslib:persist!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you already played Rolling Punch this turn, shuffle a *Dragon Punch into your draw pile.

${ModID}:SliceAndDice.NAME: Slice and Dice
${ModID}:SliceAndDice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat at half damage. NL Repeat at quarter damage twice.

${ModID}:Subterfuge.NAME: Subterfuge
${ModID}:Subterfuge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Sheathe a card in your hand.

${ModID}:Sweep.NAME: Sweep
${ModID}:Sweep.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Enemies larger than you are hit twice.

${ModID}:Throw.NAME: Throw
${ModID}:Throw.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL The next Attack you play costs 0.

${ModID}:Warstrike.NAME: Warstrike
${ModID}:Warstrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL If the enemy already had Vulnerable, apply !M! Weak.

${ModID}:Unleash.NAME: Unleash
${ModID}:Unleash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This turn, your next Attack is played twice. NL Exhaust.
